snippet.title: CNN Food Central
snippet.description:
* The prosaic sound of these dishes belies their irresistible flavor. Porcini mushrooms are a staple, too, from risotto ai funghi porcini rice with porcini to tagliatelle ai funghi porcini egg noodles with porcini sauce. It would be a crime not to elaborate on white beans when talking about Tuscan food These are ubiquitous and deliciously prepared bo...

snippet.title: Cook it quick: Matzo ball soup for the holidays
snippet.description:
* This delicious Jewish dumpling soup is a favorite first course for the holiday in households across America, including my own. In my family's case, this is not surprising. When I was growing up, we began most of our festive meals with matzo ball soup. Whether it was Passover, Rosh Hashanah or our Friday-night dinner, my mother's delectable soup wit...
http://www.cnn.com/2000/FOOD/news/11/30/matzo.ball.soup.lat/index.html
